Do you have a [thing]? (inanimate)

 

What about these things?

Dialog 1
 

Tepaqan geggunmn?

Do you have a car?

 
 

E'e, geggunm tepaqan.

Yes, I have a car.

 
 

A'gusn geggunmn?

Do you have a hat?

 
 

Moqwa', mu geggunmu a'gusn.

No, I don't have a hat.

 
 

Mu geggunmu'n a'gusn?

You don't have a hat?

 
 

Moqwa', mu geggunmu a'gusn. Geggunm magot.

No, I don't have a hat. I have a dress.
